hero.title: Frederic Wojcikowski
hero.subtitle: Frontend Engineer specializing in React, Vue.js, and legacy system modernization. Over 4 years of experience transforming complex concepts into scalable web applications for Japanese and international markets.

projects.title: Featured Work
projects.subtitle: A curated selection of recent projects showcasing modern web development practices, performance optimization, and user-centered design principles.

portfolio.title: Modern Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: A high-performance portfolio built with React 19, TypeScript, and cutting-edge CSS features including container queries, CSS nesting, and CSS Modules for optimal user experience.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform (Sample)
ecommerce.description: Comprehensive e-commerce solution featuring modern payment integration, real-time inventory management, and advanced analytics dashboard.

taskManagement.title: Task Management Application (Sample)
taskManagement.description: Collaborative task management platform with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and advanced project tracking capabilities.

aiContent.title: AI Content Generator (Sample)
aiContent.description: AI-powered content generation platform featuring natural language processing, multiple output formats, and custom model training capabilities.

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard (Sample)
analytics.description: Real-time analytics dashboard with interactive charts, data visualization, and automated reporting for business intelligence.

fitness.title: Mobile Fitness Application (Sample)
fitness.description: Cross-platform mobile application for fitness tracking, workout planning, and social features with gamification elements.

bio.main: Experienced frontend engineer with over 4 years of expertise in React, Vue.js, and Ember.js, along with TypeScript and state management solutions. My career began with self-directed learning in Japan, followed by the Code Chrysalis bootcamp, then evolved from building startup MVPs from scratch to my current role at TableCheck where I oversee dual-platform development while mentoring junior engineers. I've demonstrated the ability to deliver complex projects and features under tight deadlines, and excel in cross-cultural collaboration within Japanese business environments.
bio.hobby: Beyond development, I dedicate time to exploring emerging technologies, contributing to open source projects, and sharing knowledge with the developer community through blogs and presentations.

tablecheck.title: Frontend Engineer
tablecheck.description: Overseeing dual-platform development for restaurant management ecosystem. Managing legacy codebase modernization (Ember.js v2 to v6, CoffeeScript to TypeScript), implementing design system overhaul, and mentoring junior engineers. Specializing in React, Redux, Xstate, and Ember.js.

neopa.title: Frontend Engineer
neopa.description: Developed custom web applications for diverse clients using Vue.js, TypeScript, and Nuxt. Successfully delivered real-time transportation mapping platform for major enterprise client within 4-month deadline. Adapted to fully Japanese work environment.

airamp.title: Frontend Engineer (Freelance)
airamp.description: Designed and built revenue-sharing streaming platform MVP from scratch using React, Redux, TypeScript, and Next.js. Established complete codebase architecture and component library for collaborative content creation platform.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Ready to collaborate on your next project? I'm passionate about creating exceptional web experiences and would love to discuss how we can bring your vision to life. Let's create something extraordinary together.

form.title: Send me a message

name.label: Name
name.minLength: Name must be at least 2 characters

email.label: Email
email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

subject.label: Subject
subject.placeholder: What can I help you with?
subject.minLength: Subject must be at least 5 characters

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell me about your project, timeline, and any specific requirements...
message.minLength: Message must be at least 10 characters

form.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. I'll get back to you as soon as possible!
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again or contact me directly via email.
form.rateLimit: Please wait a minute before submitting another message.
